titles.title: To protect the name, image, and likeness rights of college athletes.
To protect the name, image, and likeness rights of college athletes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, and Education and Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
